content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research set to automation, and electrical_id updated to 24068.
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (9.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) used for producing electricity; warnings include "not connected to power network", "no input liquid", and "no fluid present in connections"; status NOT_CONNECTED; connection_points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; status NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; connection_points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); linked to fluid_system 117075 and with steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; status WORKING; connection_points at (-9.5, 23.5); linked to fluid_system 117075.
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of the following PipeGroup structures:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117075 at position(-5.5, 19.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117074 at position(-2.5, 19.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117087 at position(5.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117086 at position(1.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117082 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117091 at position(0.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117090 at position(1.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117093 at position(1.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117094 at position(4.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 117095 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Candidate Pipe Group Connection Failures (Historical):
  - Verify that the fluid_system identifiers in connection attempts match those of active PipeGroup entities and lie within the proper spatial range.

• Candidate Pipe Group Connection Failures (Recent Steps 2400–2407):
  - Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values [116411, 116495, 116577, 116661, 116743, 116827, 116909, 116993] returned no candidates within a 15-unit radius around position (-5.5, 19.5).
  - Tip: Adjust search parameters and confirm that the intended active fluid system (now updated in the pipeline network to systems like 117075 and others) is correctly referenced, ensuring candidate entities are within range.
